sql-statements.statement: SELECT o.name_primary, ii.code, ref_cpt.name, sum(quantity) units, avg(iia.plan_allow) avg_charge, avg(iia.plan_paid) avg_paid, max(iia.plan_paid) max_paid, min(iia.plan_paid) min_paid, o.org_id FROM invoice i, invoice_item ii, invoice_item_adjust iia, invoice_billing ib, insurance ins, org o, ref_cpt WHERE i.invoice_id = ii.parent_id and ii.item_id = iia.parent_id and i.billing_id = ib.bill_id and ib.bill_ins_id = ins.ins_internal_id and i.invoice_subtype not in ( 0,7 ) and o.org_internal_id = ins.ins_org_id and ref_cpt.cpt = ii.code and iia.plan_paid != 0 and (i.invoice_date >= to_date(?, 'MM/DD/YYYY') or ? is null) and (i.invoice_date <= to_date(?, 'MM/DD/YYYY') or ? is null) and (ii.service_begin_date >= to_date(?, 'MM/DD/YYYY') or ? is null) and (ii.service_end_date <= to_date(?, 'MM/DD/YYYY') or ? is null) and (ii.code >= ? or ? is null) and (ii.code <= ? or ? is null) and (o.org_id = ? or ? is null) and i.owner_id = ? GROUP BY o.name_primary, ii.code, ref_cpt.name, o.org_id order by code
